## Bio

Naomi Langlois is a current MPH student at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. She studied Public Health in her undergraduate studies at Tulane University and stayed in New Orleans to serve the community that allowed her to call New Orleans home. She worked in the sexual health and harm reduction field for 3 years before returning to school to obtain her MPH at Johns Hopkins University. Naomi is passionate about working with the communities that surround her in a harm reduction and health equity approach.
